# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.SMX property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Safer Mode Extensions. A value of true indicates the processor supports this technology.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: SMX
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

public static IPropertyKey SMX { get; }
